alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 11:03AM CST until February 12 at 1:31PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana... Little River Of Louisiana Near Rochelle affecting La Salle, Winn, Grant and Caldwell Parishes. For the Little River Of Louisiana...including Rochelle...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River Of Louisiana Near Rochelle. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Expect considerable lowland flooding of hunting camps. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 34.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum bayou stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CST Tuesday was 35.1 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to rise to a crest of 34.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 34.6 feet on 05/16/1971. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1115 AM CST.
